title: (x) Technics logo - (similar to) Egyptian 505 {Mark S}
content:
Hi. Looking for help on this:   
 ![technics](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060255im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/27527.jpg)   
Any ideas on typeface?   
Any help will be appreciated!   
Thanks

 [‹ XSBlast energy drink font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060255/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3294 "Go to previous forum topic") [Movie Poster Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060255/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3377 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dubteka

comments.content: Yes, I guess thats possible. Didn't really think about that. If so, anything else comparable?

Or, it may have been based on [Egyptian 505](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060255/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/egyptian-505/bold/testdrive.html?s=Technics&p=72). It seems a bit closer to my eye.

Good call.   
Thanks for the help.
I concur -- got called to bed before I could look any further than Egyptienne...
